nodes.text: Chad Taylor was a sabre artist at Industrial Light & Magic for the special editions of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back and Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. He was also sequence supervisor and development lead for Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace and Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, and also the Inferno artist for Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith
